page_description: Our contact-free online rental lets you skip the counter. Located off of Binford Boulevard and south of East 71st Street, our Hawthorn storage facility is minutes from Interstate 465 and Interstate 69.
about_text:
At our Hawthorn Park storage facility, located at 6901 Hawthorn Park Drive, we pride ourselves in providing residents in and around the northern Indianapolis area with a central, easily accessible location for safe and reliable storage. Located off of Binford Boulevard and south of East 71st Street, our Hawthorn storage facility is minutes from Interstate 465 and Interstate 69.

We provide you with plenty of conveniences when you store your stuff with us. For example, you can drive right up to your unit — and our facilities aisles are wide enough to accommodate moving trucks, so you don’t have to carry your items far. Plus, we use keypad entry so you don’t have to remember to bring a key or access card.

Of course, you want your stuff to be safe and secure while it’s here. Our facility is fully fenced and has security cameras that monitor the grounds 24/7. Once you leave your belongings with us, they’ll be safe and sound. But while you’re here, you too can feel secure at any time of day thanks to our bright interior and exterior lighting.

Because of its central location in the popular Avalon Hill neighborhood next to frequented restaurants and dining establishments like Ramen Ray, Steak n’ Shake, McDonald's, Starbucks, and La Hacienda Mexican restaurant, our storage facility adds ease and convenience to the entire storage process.

Our Hawthorn Park storage location offers vehicle storage and boat storage. Please contact us to confirm current availability.
custom_section_one_content:
Being near the I-465 and I-69, our location allows us to serve several cities in the Northeast Indianapolis area. We’re surrounded by several great businesses and restaurants, making your self-storage experience that much easier.

We’re near several great places to live as well. Check out these apartment complexes:
 
  • Bayview Club Apartments
  • Fountain Parc Apartments
  • TGM Avalon Lake
custom_section_two_content:
Simply Self Storage on Hawthorn Park Drive is near plenty of interesting and helpful businesses. Plenty of them is within walking distance from our facility, too.

Take Together We Rise Fitness, for example. Located just a few doors down from us, Together We Rise is a group fitness gym with a solid community feel to it. Head there if you’re looking for a community of like-minded fitness fans.

If you’re hungry, there are plenty of places to eat right up Binford Avenue from us. From traditional Mexican food at La Hacienda Mexican restaurant to pizza from Greek’s Pizzeria, there’s something for everyone around here.

Speaking of food, if you prefer to cook at home, you can grab fresh produce and other ingredients from the to pizza from Binford Farmer’s Marketjust a short drive in the opposite direction from the restaurants.
custom_section_three_content: Are you a resident of Eastwood, Devonshire, Avalon Hill, or Steinmeier Estates? If so, you’re only a minute or two away from our self storage facility. We also serve the neighborhoods of Kessler Commons, Ivy Hills, Castleton Farms, and Beaumont on the Green.

In the northern part of Columbus, sitting beside Interstate 71 you’ll find our Clintonville storage facility at 810 East Cooke Road. With the interstate to the east and the train yard and tracks to the west, you can’t miss our fully fenced facility.

We’re here to make your storage experience quick and painless. Our facilities offer drive-up access to your unit, and our aisles are wide enough to fit moving trucks. Plus, we have carts and dollies so you don’t have to carry your things. And if you ever need a package to be delivered to your unit, we can accept your delivery for you.

Our security is top-notch. With 24/7 camera surveillance and keypad entry required to get in, your belongings will be safe and secure in our full-fenced facility. You too can feel safe and secure while you’re here, thanks to our interior and exterior lighting.

Our Clintonville storage location offers vehicle storage and boat storage. Please contact us to confirm current availability.

custom_section_three_content: Residents of several local neighborhoods will find our Clintonville facility to meet their storage needs. If you live in Old Beechwold, Clinton Estates, Woodward Park, Salem Village, Sharon Heights, or another nearby neighborhood, you’re only a short drive away,
custom_section_four_content:
Our facility sits near a lot of different businesses. If you’re moving into a new house, one place you’ll want to visit is American Freight Furniture and Mattress. They’ve got pieces for your living room, dining room, bedroom, and more.

Another store you should check out if you’re moving — or if you’re remodeling — is the nearby Tile Shop. They can help you create the perfect design for any space around your house.

Fan of the water? Every wanted to go scuba diving? Columbus Scuba is a scuba diving school just up the road from us. Whether you just want to dip your toes into scuba diving, become open-water certified, or just need to rent some equipment, they’ve got what you need.

On the border of Indiana, about 2 1/2 hours south of Chicago, you’ll find our Danville storage facility. Found in the northeastern part of the city, you can easily reach our facility by heading north until you reach Voorhees Street, then following the road east until you reach our location at 1810 East Voorhees Street. Our fully fenced facility is hard to miss.

We pride ourselves on how secure we keep our premises. Across our fully-fenced facility is a network of security cameras, keeping a watchful eye on everything. We’ve dotted our facility with bright lighting as well to keep you feeling secure when it’s dark out.

We make convenience a centerpoint of our self-storage approach, too. For example, our facilities aisles are wide enough to accommodate moving trucks, and you can drive right up to your unit. We’ve also got packing supplies in stock so you don’t have to bring your own.

Our Danville storage location offers climated controlled storage, vehicle storage, and boat storage. Please contact us to confirm current availability.

Sitting beside Advance Auto Parts, right across from the South Drive-In Theater, we’re easy to spot!

Our Columbus storage facility is all about self-storage convenience. That’s why we have carts, dollies, and packing supplies on hand for you. Getting to your unit is also easy — moving truck or not — thanks to our facility’s moving-truck-sized aisles. Oh, and we can also accept deliveries to your unit for you.

We also take several measures to ensure security is strong. For example, our facility is fully-fenced and monitored 24/7 by security cameras. To keep you feeling secure while you’re here, we also lined the place with bright lighting, both indoors and outdoors. Our units use keypad entry so there’s no risk of your key getting lost or stolen.

Our Columbus storage location offers vehicle storage and boat storage. Please contact us to confirm current availability.

If you’re looking to get a good deal — or some fast cash — then you’ll want to head a little bit north on High Street to find Buckeye Pawn Shop. They’ve got jewelry, electronics, sporting goods, and more in their inventory.

Of course, you’ll also have the most convenient self-storage experience here at Simply Self Storage. You’ll find packing supplies, carts, dollies, an elevator, a loading dock, and climate-controlled storage on-site to make storing with us even easier. Storage shouldn’t be hard work!

page_description: Our contact-free online rental lets you skip the counter. Just west of Orlando, you'll find our Winter Garden storage facility, located at 12446 W. Colonial Drive - just west of the Florida Turnpike and Daniel Webster Western Beltway Interchange.
about_text:
If you’re looking for an amazing self-storage facility in the Winter Garden area, then look no further than our Simply Self Storage Winter Garden location. We have everything you need to provide you with a convenient self-storage experience.
The safety and security of you and your belongings is our top concern. That’s why our self-storage facility is fully-fenced and outfitted with surveillance cameras that monitor our premises 24/7. Whether you’re storing or retrieving your items from your storage unit, you can feel secure at any time of the day at our facility thanks to bright indoor and outdoor lighting. Plus, we employ keypad entry so you don’t have to worry about forgetting your key or access card at home.
Your convenience is another priority of ours. Don’t worry about lugging your belongings far to or from your unit — our facility provides drive-up access to all units, and our aisles are wide enough to accommodate moving trucks! But to make your storage experience even easier, we have carts, dollies, and packing supplies on hand, not to mention a team of storage experts to answer any questions you have.
Just west of Orlando, you’ll find our Winter Garden storage facility, located at 12446 W. Colonial Drive - just west of the Florida Turnpike and Daniel Webster Western Beltway Interchange. Wherever you are in the area, you can get to us quickly and easily. Exit Florida’s Turnpike just east of the interchange at West Colonial Drive and travel west until you reach between Auto Sales of Winter Garden and Conoley Citrus Packers.
custom_section_one_content: At Simply Self Storage, we’re known for our commitment to our customers, and also to the communities we’re a part of. All across America, we’ve teamed up with charities to help serve the areas we’re proud to be a part of, partnering with charities in the greater Orlando area to help serve those around us and continue making our community a better place to be.
custom_section_two_content:
Our facility proudly serves Winter Garden, as well as Ocoee, Oakland, Tildenville, Gotha, and even Paradise Heights.
We’re surrounded by several businesses and we’re pretty close to the Florida Turnpike, so navigating to and from our facility is easy.
Plus, there’s some great housing in our area. Check out these great apartments:
West Pointe Apartments
Casa Mirella Apartment Homes
The Oasis at Lake Benet
custom_section_three_content:
Whether you’re moving or just need to put a few large items in storage, one of the most important things you need is a moving truck. Lucky for you, there’s a U-Haul location a mile east of our facility.
Speaking of moving, you might be looking for some furniture to fill your new home. Just a half a mile down the street is Baer's Furniture where you can get some excellent pieces to fill out your new place. Of course, if you aren’t ready to move your new furniture into your new place yet, you can always store it at Simply Self Storage Winter Garden!
If you haven’t washed your car in a while, knock it out while you’re in the area by paying a visit to Class Car Wash . They wash your car fast by hand or machine, and they can detail your car, too.
But if your car’s problems go beyond a simple scrub and you need some service done, we’ve got car service shops on all sides of our facility.
custom_section_four_content:
Thanks to our great location on West Colonial Drive just west of the Florida Turnpike and Daniel Webster Western Beltway Interchange, residents of several local residential areas can store their belongings at our top-of-the-line facility. These neighborhoods include places such as Ocoee, Oakland, Tildenville, and Gotha.
If you’re in any of these areas and you’re looking for storage, our Winter Garden location is just a short highway trip away.

When you get here, you’ll find the best in self-storage convenience. For one, we offer access 7 days per week. Come on in whatever day you’re free! Plus, we have packing supplies on hand, so you won’t have to bring any with you. As for payment, we don’t require a security deposit, and we offer month-to-month leases if you need short-term storage. Feel free to set up your credit card for automatic billing as well — you’ll never miss a monthly payment.

You can rest assured we take several security measures to keep you and your items safe. We have video surveillance cameras monitoring our facility around the clock, and there’s bright lighting around the exterior of the facility to help you see in the dark.

custom_section_four_content:
Simply Self Storage Logo

Property Photo Approval Requirements

To maintain high quality image content and remain consistent with standards detailed in the Simply Self Storage Brand Guide, this document serves to provide insight into the required attributes of photos submitted to digital@simplyss.com for use on the company website, third party websites, listing platforms, printed marketing collateral, and social media.
The following guidelines and rules are considered when evaluating photos submissions for any customer-facing use.

Resolution

Resolution refers to the detail an image holds. It can be measured in a variety of ways. For our purposes, we measure resolution by the total number of pixels. The minimum number of pixels required for a photo to be approved is 361,500 (or 750 pixels by 482 pixels). This, however, is the minimum required. Photos submitted with a higher resolution are far superior, as it allows greater flexibility for editing. It is recommended to only submit photos that have at least 1,446,000 (or 1500 pixels by 964 pixels) to allow greater room for editing and compression. A good rule of thumb is to use the highest resolution available on the device you’re shooting with. Most any smartphone camera manufactured in the last several years offers more than adequate resolution.

Take Carmenita Road north. Go past Alondra Blvd and then you'll cross Interstate 5 (Santa Ana Freeway). You'll pass a Crossfit gym and some industrial area, with some residential on your left. When you start getting close to the Burger King get in the right lane, because you're going to want to take a right onto Rosecrans Avenue east. Right after you turn, look for Simply Self Storage Santa Fe Springs on your left.

From the East
Rosecrans Ave. That's all you need to know. Rosecrans Avenue goes all the way from Euclid Street all the way to our location, which will be on the right. You can't miss it.

From the West
Same story. Luckily Rosecrans Ave intersects with one of LA's biggest highways, Interstate 605. Going east on Rosecrans, you'll pass the In-N-Out Burger, then Interstate 5, until you eventually arrive at the Shoemaker Ave Rosecrans Ave intersection. Go straight through. Simply Self Storage Santa Fe Springs is on the left.

about_text:
Our Plano storage facility is located at 3980 Turner Avenue. off of Route 34, just west of Eldamain Road, across from Tire Tracks USA.

If you’re looking for a self-storage facility that makes the entire experience easy, then look no further than Simply Self Storage Plano. We’ve got plenty of modern storage amenities, like drive-up unit access and keypad entry. Plus, we’ve got packing supplies on hand, and we can accept deliveries for you.

We’re also careful about security at Simply Self Storage Plano. We monitor our fully-fenced facility 24 hours a day with a network of security cameras, and we ensure both the interior and exterior of our grounds are always lit brightly. 

Our Plano storage facility offers climate controlled storage. Please contact us to confirm current availability.
custom_section_one_content:
Our facility serves Plano, IL, as well as surrounding cities and towns such as Bristol, Fox, Millbrook, and Yorkville. Thanks to our location between Plano and Yorkville, we’re nearby a lot of businesses and amenities.

custom_section_two_content: Residents of several suburbs around Plano will enjoy our self-storage facility’s conveniences and features. Some of these communities include Fox Hill and Lakewood Springs. Yorkville residents are just a short drive away from us as well, so come stop by!
custom_section_three_content:
Our self-storage facility is surrounded by numerous businesses and amenities.

Need some new tires? Well, you’re in luck because the Tire Tracks USA tire shop is our next-door neighbor. Just walk across Turner Avenue and you’ll be there.

Speaking of tires, if you need to get a new driver’s license (or take your kid to get their first), the Illinois Secretary of State is just down Walter Payton Memorial Highway from us.

And if you’re looking for a gym or health club in Plano, you’ll want to check out Fox Valley YMCA. They’ve got plenty of fitness equipment, classes, and amenities for you to look and feel great.

description:

page_description: Our contact-free online rental lets you skip the counter. Our Huntington Station storage facility at 670 E Jericho Turnpike is located in the northern section of Long Island. We are just Southwest of Huntington Station along highway 25.
about_text:
Simply Self Storage Huntington Station is the newest and hottest place to store. This state-of-the-art storage facility touts pristine climate controlled storage units, brightly lit hallways, and so many moving carts that you'll think you're at a Red Bull Soapbox Derby. But don't let that scare you, because our highly trained storage experts on site are dedicated to warmly welcoming you into our modern and sleek front office.

Huntington Station's new Simply Self Storage location goes beyond everything you'd expect in your local neighborhood storage provider. Unmatched security, diverse storage unit sizes and types, and stainless steel elevators will make you feel like you've entered a sci-fi utopia tailored to your every storage desire. Need an extra box? We've got enough cardboard to build the biggest box fort the world has ever seen. Need packing tape? We have miles of it. Need a person to help you find your unit? Your property manager is ready to guide you every step of the way with so much grace and charm that you'll feel like royalty as you rule the land of your 5'x5' Climate Controlled dominion.

When you store at Simply Self Storage Huntington Station, you're not just putting your stuff in a storage unit. You're hiring a team of people who care about your precious belongings as much as you do. You're taking your de-cluttering quest to a level that makes travel bloggers look weighed down. You're buying a front row ticket to a dazzling self storage experience that will shake you to the bone and leave you thinking "When can I get my next 10x10?"
custom_section_one_content: None
custom_section_two_content:
Simply Self Storage Huntington Station is smack-dab in the middle of some of New York's most beloved businesses and cultural suppliers. For example, One Stop Dancewear has been serving the local dance scene both inside and outside the dance hall for years. We know what you're thinking... "Oh, but I already have so many tutus and spandex...". Well say no more. That's one of the reasons we built Simply Self Storage Huntington Station right next door. Now you can have near-unlimited closet space. So go ahead and treat yourself to that sequin leotard. We have so much storage space you'll be wondering why you even need to trek to the dance hall when you can just practice your pirouettes in a spacious 10'x20' indoor climate control storage unit.

Dance not your thing? Well Highway 25 is home to some of the best local auto shops, suppliers, dealers, and collectors in the New York area. Just nearby you'll see Advance Auto Parts, Jiffy Lube, Advance Automotive, Huntington Mazda, Nissan of Huntington, Volkswagen of Huntington, M&A Motors, and more. Perhaps our favorite nearby business is Habberstad MINI though, because we like to imagine how many Mini Coopers we can fit into a 10x30 storage unit, especially if we stack them on top of each other.

Moving is a daunting task. And when you move, you work up an insatiable appetite. That's why Simply Self Storage is also located near some of Huntington Station's most delicious cuisines. Arancine's Pizza is right around the corner and they have some really uniquely savory pizzas, including Baked Ziti Pizza, Baked Clam Pizza, Chicken Thai Pizza, and even some monstrosity of goodness called the "Everything Pizza". Now that's great reward for your post storage move-in celebration!. Some other restaurants nearby include Shah's Halal Huntington Station, The Greek Grill, and Kabul Afghan Restaurant. Wow! Our property manager loves the myriad of choices for take out!

Huntington Station has a plethora of moving companies ready to help you with your moving boxes. One of the highest rated moving companies in the local area is Men on the Move Moving Professionals located at just a short distance west. They have a couple self-storage locations themselves, but we operate in quite a harmonious relationship with them. We proposed hosted a self storage packing unit competition with them, but we couldn't agree on whether to compete in space utilization or box transfer speed. Another moving company we recommend is Hall Lane Lane Moving & Storage. They're great movers, but we respectfully claim the #1 spot for self storage excellence.
custom_section_three_content:
There are so many things that inspire us about the Simply Self Storage's newest self storage location's city of Huntington Station, NY. For example, did you know that Walt Whitman was born here? You can actually go and see his birthplace right around the corner! You can call our property manager and storage expert on site by their first name, but if you're feeling particularly bold, call them "O Captain, my Captain!"

Huntington Station is originally named after the railroad station. It's ranked as one of the best places to live in New York by Sperling & Niche.

One of our favorite things to do when we visit Simply Self Storage Huntington Station is visit Station Sports Family Fun Center, which has paintball, battling cages, and a game room. Sometimes we like to take our company CEO there and let him win a round of miniature golf!
custom_section_four_content: Simply Self Storage Huntington Station serves a variety of local neighborhoods, residential areas, and apartments. If you live at Atria Huntington, you'll find our facilities perfect for downsizing while keep all your family heirlooms. Other nearby residential areas include South Huntington, Maplewood Road, Pidgeon Hill Road, and Depot Road.
custom_section_directions_content:
Simply Self Storage Huntington Station is uniquely accessible from central and northern Long Island. We actually have a couple other locations nearby at Lindenhurst and Hauppauge. But just in case you're not much for navigation apps, here are some directions on how to get here:

From the North
Hire a captain at the Old Greenwich Yacht Club to sail you from Greenwich, CT to Cold Springs Harbor, NY. After you land at Cold Spring Harbor Beach Club, take Harbor Road south to Oheka Castle, then go east on West Jericho Turnpike. Simply Self Storage is on your right.

From the South
Once your done at Adventureland and ready to take on the real adventure of navigating Long Islands roads, head north on 110 toward Melville. Turn right onto 25 (Jericho). Simply Self Storage Huntington Station will be on your right. If you crash into the icy waves of the Atlantic and find yourself sinking into the depths of Davy Jones' Locker and wondering if this unfortunate fate is the result of a curse from insulting a cranky old man's cooking and "spilling your beans" at that Lighthouse outpost you manned years ago... you've gone too far.

From the East
Hop on Greenport MTA LIRR station. Click here for a map if you need it. Ride the railroad on the purple line all the way from the Northeast to Hicksville. From there, transfer to the blue line and get off at Huntington. Hail an Uber or Lyft and tell them you need to get to Simply Self Storage Huntington Station, pronto.

From the West
If you buy too many souvenirs from the Old Westbury Gardens gift shop, we have small 5'x5' units available you can store them in. Just take a right as you leave the parking lot and head east on 495 Long Island Expressway. But not for too long, because you'll want to get off at Northern State Parkway and then get off at Wolf Hill Road. Go north on Pidgeon Hill Road, then right on 25. Simply Self Storage Huntington Station is on your right. Look for large, beautifully lit majestic building with the sunbeams shining down on it as it glistens in the middle of a freshly paved parking lot and beckons to you in a faint, soft whisper "First Full Month Free on Select Units..."

custom_section_one_content: At Simply Self Storage, we pride ourselves on offering only the best storage solutions to our customers at affordable prices, but did you know our dedication to the community goes further than that? All across the country, we’ve teamed with charities to help better the communities we’re a part of, which is why we’ve partnered with charities in the Windermere area. We encourage our employees to give back at every opportunity—we want to be a part of the solution, and see no better way to do that than through service.
